title: GoPro: The Martian - Life on Mars
description:
Join astronaut, botanist and mechanical engineer Mark Watney as he takes us through his daily routine while stranded on Mars during the Ares 3 mission.

Be sure to catch The Martian in theaters Friday Oct 2nd.


Shot 100% on the HERO4® camera

asset.title: GoPro: The Martian - Life on Mars
asset.description:
Join astronaut, botanist and mechanical engineer Mark Watney as he takes us through his daily routine while stranded on Mars during the Ares 3 mission.

Be sure to catch The Martian in theaters Friday Oct 2nd.

For more info on how GoPros were used in the film check out:
https://gopro.com/news/ridley-scott-takes-gopro-to-mars

transcripts: So here's the rub, I gotta figure out a way to grow 3 years worth of food here on a planet where nothing grows. Luckily I'm a botanist, Mars will come to fear my botany powers. I colonized Mars, in your face Neil Armstrong, okay.
